sourcesContent:
import colors from './colors'

const miniNftCard = {
  borderRadius: 20,
  padding: 8,
  errorBackground: colors['grey-600'],
  width: 148,
  height: 148,
  errorImageTop: 5,
  details: {
    defaultLeft: 10,
    background: colors['grey-800'],
  },
  price: {
    default: colors.primary,
    error: colors.red,
    fontSize: 18,
    paddingTop: 2,
    paddingLeft: 16,
    borderRadius: 20,
  },
  name: {
    default: colors['grey-300'],
    error: colors.red,
    fontSize: 12,
    paddingTop: 4,
    paddingLeft: 8,
    lineHeight: 14,
    borderRadius: 20,
    blur: 30,
  },
}

export default miniNftCard
